item.title: Unable to connect from the vSphere Client or PowerCLI on Windows XP or Windows 2003 to a vCenter Server 5.5
item.description: In my lab environment I still have a Windows XP with the vSphere Client 5.5 installed. When I try to connect with the vSphere Client or vSphere PowerCLI it faisl to connect to the vCenter Server 5.5 or vCenter Server Appliance (VCSA) 5.5. The following errors appears (The OS has a Dutch language installed): PowerCLI error: In the release notes of vSphere 5.5 this is a known issue: vSphere 5.5 uses the Open SSL library, which, for security, is configured by default to accept only connections that use strong cipher suites.
